name: FACTORY PACKAGE TYCOON
description:
Hello, Welcome to you're new Company,"  Factory Package Tycoon Company "you are the new Owner and CEO of the new Company.Help this Company reach Success!

This Game is filled with items to purchase and hire Security to protect you're company and also security also gets paid so watch out for that!

FEATURES

-Items

-Security

-New Updates

PLEASE NOTE!!! FACTORY PACKAGE TYCOON COSTS REAL MONEY!!!
